Package com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub.interceptor

package com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub.interceptor
These ChannelInterceptor modules process incoming STOMP messages.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub
    Serves the major components of the server module.
    com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub.config
    Holds all major configurations beans for the web application.
    com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub.events
    Classes that inform about an important event, such as a currently connecting client.
    com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub.messages
    Holds all message types that are being exchanged between the clients and the server.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConnectionEventPublisher
    Intercepts the incoming MessageChannel for connecting and disconnecting clients and logs and publishes those events as StompClientEvent on the ApplicationEventPublisher.
    UnregisteredClientsGuard
    Prevents clients from subscribing unto a topic and raises an disconnecting exception, unless they were registered beforehand.
